result.title: STRANGE TLE & WRONG ANS
result.content:
I've been trying to solve this question 253A - Мальчики и девочки

21977255 My first submission gave me a TLE, I can't seem to figure out why.

21977530 I tried doing it in another way & it shows WRONG ANS ON TEST CASE 1, but it worked fine & gave correct ans on CodeBlocks, CodeChef IDE as well as the Codeforces Custom Test :|

Could someone help me figure out what's is wrong with my submissions?

Thanks x
